price: Repel evil with what is best; We know well what they claim[43].
arabic: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
footnotes: [43] That there are other gods besides Allah, and that the Prophet is a liar, a poet, etc.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: id'faʿ bi-allatī hiya aḥsanu al-sayi-ata naḥnu aʿlamu bimā yaṣifūna
